name: velld
description: velld is a self-hosted personal dashboard for organizing notes, tasks, and links. It provides a simple, customizable homepage-like interface optimized for everyday productivity.
features: Personal dashboard: Organize daily information in a customizable homepage-style dashboard.
Note taking: Jot down quick notes and ideas with a simple note-taking interface.
Task management: Track tasks and to-dos with checkboxes and completion tracking.
Link organization: Store and organize frequently accessed links and bookmarks.
Customizable layout: Arrange dashboard widgets and sections to match your workflow.
Clean interface: Navigate a minimalist, distraction-free interface focused on productivity.
Quick access: Use as your browser homepage for instant access to your information.
Mobile-friendly: Access your dashboard from any device with responsive design.
Privacy-focused: Keep all personal data on your own server without external dependencies.
Lightweight: Run with minimal resources suitable for always-on personal use.
Simple setup: Get started quickly with minimal configuration and intuitive interface.
Daily productivity: Centralize daily tools and information in one convenient location.
